```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data<- read_csv("HW_#2.csv")

```

Make a plot for the demand curves

```{r}
demand_1<- ggplot(data, aes(x = Q_Low_Gallons_per_Day, y = Price_Dollars))+
  geom_smooth()
demand_1

demand_2<- ggplot(data, aes(x = Q_High_Gallons_per_Day, y = Price_Dollars))+
  geom_smooth()
demand_2

```
